nodes.text: Holo Record 26714 was a record taken by the Jedi Kanan Jarrus. It narrated about the members of the Ghost and the events they got through, from the first time the rebels met Ezra Bridger to the action at Mustafar. The record was stored in Kanan Jarrus' holocron.
Holo Record 26714 is a narration summarizing the events of Star Wars Rebels Season One.
